definitions.body: vinegar—´[[ח]] abs. Pr 10:26 + 3 t.; cstr. Nu 6:3, Nu 6:3; —a common condiment Ru 2:14, forbidden to Nazirite ([[יין]] ´[[ח]] and [[שֵׁכָר]] ´[[ח]]) Nu 6:3, Nu 6:3 (P), offered (in cruelty) to a thirsty man Ps 69:22 (fig. for harshness lack of sympathy); in sim. of sluggard [[כַּחׂמֶץ לַשִּׁנַּיִם]] Pr 10:26, [[עַל־נָׇ֑תֶר]] ´[[ח]] Pr 25:20 vinegar on nitre (sim. of merry songs for the heavy-hearted).
